data.title: Humans are reportedly being sold as slaves for $400 each on the front line of the migrant crisis
The United Nations is considering a possible ban on “killer robots”.
U.S. President Donald Trump said in a tweet on Friday he is putting a decision to allow imports of big game trophies on hold until he can “review all conservation facts.”
Russia cast a second veto in as many days at the United Nations Security Council on Friday to block the renewal of a probe to identify the perpetrators of chemical weapons attacks in Syria.

A federal judge is considering whether President Donald Trump’s own tweets could force the federal government to reveal more information about its efforts to verify the claims in the controversial privately compiled dossier about Trump’s alleged ties to Russia.

Our Plastic Is Polluting Marine Life Found 36,000 Ft Below Ocean Surface - Team captured 90 specimens from bottom of 6 trenches. Every single one had ingested plastics. In some cases “the fibers could actually be seen in the stomach contents as they were being removed.”
